# Dragon ball GT Opening  (Fiery Lightning)

1261 $C1 13 $G2 587 $G2 16 $C1 561 $E1 61 $E2 306 $F2 267 $G2 277 $A2 308 $G2 578 $F2 577 $E1 5 $E2 579 $D1 25 $D2 595 $E1 4 $E2 544 $E1 18 $E2 568 $C2 268 $D2 283 $E2 278 $F2 317 $E2 591 $D2 578 $C2 560 $B1 567 $A1 14 $E1 807 $E1 26 $A1 308 $C2 21 $G1 572 $A2 584 $G2 1089 $C2 20 $G1 856 $D2 214 $E2 204 $F2 566 $E2 535 $D2 601 $C2 1014 $E2 13 $E1 545 $E1 8 $E2 293 $D1 44 $D2 1455 $C1 11 $G2 578 $G2 12 $C1 556 $E1 25 $E2 352 $F2 276 $G2 283 $A2 293 $G2 293 $G2 292 $F2 284 $F2 302 $E2 608 $D2 598 $E1 4 $E2 585 $E2 20 $E1 659 $C2 283 $D2 327 $E2 299 $F2 269 $E2 576 $D2 626 $C2 584 $B1 579 $E1 15 $A1 778 $A1 26 $E1 290 $C2 37 $G1 531 $A2 561 $G2 1078 $G1 14 $C2 731 $D2 225 $E2 178 $F2 531 $E2 569 $D2 558 $C2 612 $D2 8 $D1 1206 $G1 5 $C2 618 $B1 11 $D1 677 $C2 50 $G1
